simplestreams.title: Query Simple-streams
simplestreams.description: Query simple-streams data using SQL and expose results as a JSON API. Example queries listed below.

queries.base_images: select * from cloudimage where family = 'base' order by updated desc
queries.minimal_images: select * from cloudimage where family = 'minimal' order by updated desc
queries.bionic_base_images: select * from cloudimage where label = 'release' and release = 'bionic' and family = 'base' order by updated desc
queries.bionic_minimal_images: select * from cloudimage where release = 'bionic' and family = 'minimal' order by updated desc
queries.xenial_base_images: select * from cloudimage where label = 'release' and release = 'xenial' and family = 'base' order by updated desc
queries.xenial_minimal_images: select * from cloudimage where release = 'xenial' and family = 'minimal' order by updated desc
queries.trusty_images: select * from cloudimage where label = 'release' and release = 'trusty' and family = 'base' order by updated desc
queries.aws_bionic: select * from cloudimage where aliases like '%18.04%' and arch = 'amd64' and content_id like '%aws%' and family = 'base' order by aliases desc
queries.aws_bionic_eu_west_1_ami: select image_id from cloudimage where aliases like '%18.04%' and arch = 'amd64' and content_id like '%aws%' and virt = 'hvm' and root_store = 'ssd' and region = 'eu-west-1' and family = 'base' order by updated desc
queries.bionic_aws_azure_gce_europe: select content_id, image_id, region from cloudimage where release = 'bionic' and (content_id like '%aws' or content_id like '%gce' or content_id like '%azure') and arch = 'amd64' and (region like 'eu-west-%' or region like 'West Europe' or region like 'europe-west%') and family = 'base' order by updated desc
queries.download_bionic: select content_id, item_url, sha256 from cloudimage where label = 'release' and release = 'bionic' and content_id like '%download' and arch = 'amd64' and item_name = 'squashfs' and family = 'base' order by updated desc limit 1
